Package Hospital.Controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdministratorController
    LoginController for the Hospital Administrator.
    CampusController
    Provides controlled access to campuses and campus-related functionality This enables the following usecases: check in : has enough food to register a new patient login : states that a loginController is logged in at the given campus
    CommandInfo
    Identifies a command in the system
    DiagnosisController
    The DiagnosisController is used by DoctorControllers to perform diagnosis-related actions, including: Creating diagnoses Approving/disapproving diagnoses Determining the type of a diagnosis Finding available doctors to ask a second opinion from To create a DiagnosisController, the LoginController of a logged in Doctor is required.
    DoctorController
    As the LoginController for a Doctor, this class represents the Doctor when he/she is logged in and provides access to functionality related to this Doctor.
    LoginController<T extends Staff>
    This controller is created when a user logs in and will represent this user for the duration of his/her session.
    MachineController
    Used to perform Machine-related actions.
    MedicalTestController
    Used to perform MedicalTest-related actions This controller enables the following usecases: Order medicaltest.
    MedicalTestInfo
    This class represents a medical test object
    MedicalTestResultController
    Used to perform MedicalTestResult-related actions.
    NurseController
    LoginController for Nurses This controller enables the following usecases: check in : check the given patient in, the patient must exist
    PatientController
    Used for patient-related actions that are handled by a nurse This controller enables the following usecases: Register patient: register the patient
    PatientFile
    This class gives a way to view the PatientFile in a safe way.
    StaffController
    This controller enables the following usecases: Create new staffmembers, a single API call is enough.
    TreatmentController
    This controller enables the following usecases: Order Treatment: returns a list of all untreated diagnoses of the current patient.
    TreatmentInfo
    Represents a Treatment-object in the public world.
    TreatmentResultController
    This controller adds the function to enter treatment-results to the main public API This controller enables the following usecases: Enter TreatmentResults: return the list of Arguments that must be answered enter the list of Arguments as results in the treatment
    WareHouseController
    This controller handles the login of a warehousemanager.
    WorldController
    This controller gives controlled access to the world it represents.
